attributes.action: 4-day working week to increase proletariat productivity and morale.
attributes.background: The time of the corporation has ended. The time of the worker has began.

rejection.details:
We're not sure whether you want a 4-day working week to apply only to certain types of jobs or more broadly.

In any case, there's already a petition about this issue. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/271308
